    • Method Detail

      • getTotalDistanceByID

        public double getTotalDistanceByID(int bikeId)
        Returns the total distance travelled for a specific bike. Uses the bike id as a parameter
        Parameters:
        bikeId - A int bike id which refers to a bike id in the database
        Returns:
        a sum of the total distance travelled by the specified bike.

      • getTotalDistance

        public double getTotalDistance(java.util.ArrayList<BikeData> bikeDataList)
        Returns a calculation of the total distance for an ArrayList of BikeData. Uses getDistanceBetweenCoords to calculate the total distance.
        Parameters:
        bikeDataList - This parameter specifies the ArrayList of BikeData.
        Returns:
        a calculation of the total distance for the ArrayList of BikeData.
        See Also:
        BikeData

      • getDistanceBetweenCoords

        public double getDistanceBetweenCoords(double lat1,
                                       double lng1,
                                       double lat2,
                                       double lng2)
        Returns a calculation of the distance between two coordinates.
        Parameters:
        lat1 - This parameter specifies the latitude for the first coordinate.
        lng1 - This parameter specifies the longitude for the first coordinate.
        lat2 - This parameter specifies the latitude for the second coordinate.
        lng2 - This parameter specifies the longitude for the second coordinate.
        Returns:
        the distance between the two coordinates specified in the parameters.

      • getBikeCheckInsAndOuts

        public double getBikeCheckInsAndOuts(int stationId,
                                     boolean checkIns)
        Returns the amount of check ins or check outs from stations depending on the checkIns parameter
        Parameters:
        stationId - This parameter specifies which station.
        checkIns - This parameter says if the method should calculate check ins or check outs. True for check ins and false for check outs
        Returns:
        an amount of check ins or check outs depending on the checkIns parameter.
        See Also:
        Trip

      • getProfitForMonth

        public double getProfitForMonth(int year,
                                int month)
        Returns profit for a specified month. It uses EconomyDAO to get the different values (bike costs, repair costs and bike income) from the database.
        Parameters:
        year - This parameter says which year.
        month - This parameter says which month.
        Returns:
        a sum of the profits for the specified month and year.
        See Also:
        EconomyDAO, EconomyData
